    \def\minx{-10}
    \def\maxx{60}
    \def\miny{12}

      scientific axes = inner ticks,
      all axes = {grid},
      x axis = {length = \textwidth, label = {SNR (dB)},

      ticks = {major = {at = {-10, 0, ..., 60}}},

      y axis = {length = 0.7\textwidth, label = {$\theta_{th}$},
      min value = \miny, max value = \maxy, ticks = few},
      visualize as line/.list = {1, 2, 3},
      style sheet = strong colors,
      style sheet = vary dashing,
      1 = {pin in data = {text = {$2\times 2$}, when=x is -5, pin length = 6ex}},
      2 = {pin in data = {text = {$4\times 4$}, when=x is -5, pin length = 5ex}},
      3 = {pin in data = {text = {$10\times 10$}, when=x is -5, pin length = 2ex}},
